extendedInfo.description: Saddle up for a wacky and wild ride!Fly around the world as Chente, the Last Mariachi in search of the Magical Blue Agave Plant.For centuries, the Mariachi have disguised themselves with the sweet and sharp sounds of violin, trumpet, and guitarrÃ³ over a mix of syncopation and on-beat rhythm as they kept balance in the world by secretly protecting the Magical Blue Agave Plant.But now all the Mariachi are dead except Chente, the Magical Blue Agave Plant has been stolen, and the whole world is out of whack!Help Chente restore balance and return the Magical Blue Agave Plant!Dodge chattering teeth, eyeballs, UFOs, and more as you fly on a magical saddle through level after dazzling, hand drawn level.Blast enemies down with your pistola or if they become too much, use a bottle of tequila to drop them all from the sky! But remember to use your tequila wisely.Grab all the Pesos you can to restore your life but donât let anything your enemies throw at you touch. Staying on that magical saddle until you recover the Magical Blue Agave Plant is the only thing that will save the world from insanity, chaos, and doom.Donât let the Mariachi have died in vain!Updates include even more fun and fantastically wild levels that take Chente and you from an old mexican church to the desert, the jungle, an alligator-filled river, Hollywood, Paris, Rome, the Coliseum, and moreâ¦--A fun, funny, and fantastic game!----Classic, addictive gameplay combined with new imagination and humor!â--Wackiest game on iTunes!----Most imaginative game since Angry Birds and itâs free!â--This game throws everything at you, including the kitchen sink!â

reviews.title: Sucks
reviews.comment: This game sucks so much it freezes a lot and u get killed in level one
reviews.author: Delfino Trujillo
